page.title: 08Industry - Castle Kennedy
page.content:
{Sawmill.}This is on the site of an old airfield.It uses local wood to make stobs,woven fencing,farm gates,etc. It sells the trimmings as firewood and supplies farms with sawdust for animal bedding.Seven men are employed.
{Richardson's.}a){Garage.}On the main road where Village Hall used to be. As well as petrol and diesel,farm machines are sold and serviced. Thirteen people are employed here. b){Agricultural merchant There are two grain dryers to dry barley from local farms. The driers were opened in 1965. Before the barley is dried it is weighed and the moisture content taken. Afterwards the barley is taken back by the farmers and any surplus to their requirements is sold.Eight men are employed here.
